import React, { Component } from "react"; import UserItem from "./UserItem"; import UserService from "../../Services/userService"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; let userService = new UserService() class User extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { user: { taiKhoan: "", matKhau: "", hoTen: "", soDT: "", maLoaiNguoiDung: "HV", maNhom: "GP01", email: "" } } } onChange = (e) => { this.setState({ user: { ...this.state.user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value } }, console.log(this.state.user) ) } onAddUser = () => { userService.addUser(this.state.user).then(res => { console.log("Them thanh cong"); }).catch(err => { console.log(err); }) } render() { return (
